room_title: Escape room "Green's Garage" by Map Dot Escape Room in Atlanta
room_description: You and your team are a part of the local Gang and Drugs Task Force and have currently located the notorious hideout of criminal mastermind Chaz Green. We believe that he and his motorcycle gang, Freedom of America, are responsible for the recent ten million dollar heist of a local bank. We have detained Mr. Green for exactly one hour, and you and your team have to find the stolen money before he returns.
